job_history.work_description: Checked in an average of 60 passengers per check-in, being a team player by helping colleagues achieve targets and solve problems to meet daily KPIs, serving customers in a polite and professional manner according to Singapore Airlines standards, dispatching flights on time which included overseeing the boarding of the aircraft, demonstrating an in-depth knowledge of key health and safety standards used within the industry, working alongside airline duty officers to meet KPIs and airline standards, consistently achieved airline on-time performance standards, demonstrated the ability to handle complex situations within the given industry safety measures, significantly improved the customer experience, regularly converting unhappy customers to very satisfied customers.

Selling Travel products to a wide range of clients, helping train new team members in key competencies, handling customer payments and accounting, being a team player by coaching colleagues on the sales process to reach store revenue targets, adopting business strategies including local store marketing and financing, dealing with customer complaints, providing business solutions, liaising with airline representatives and wholesalers, liaising with wholesalers to drive sales and meet targets.

job_history.role_name: Corporate Travel Manager / Staff Developer and Trainer
job_history.work_description: Assisting with on the job sales, product and systems training for new staff members, developing staff in core competences to ensure success, researching travel options & presenting the best deals in terms of customer requirements, ensuring all bookings & reservations are processed accurately, responding to all phone enquiries promptly, courteously and in a friendly manner, filing, photocopying and general administrative duties, building strong relationships with clients, ability to achieve branch, team sales and profitability objectives, up selling relevant add-ons, negotiating corporate and best rates with hotels, advising on and organising visas & passports, booking rail, hotel, domestic and international air travel, monitoring competitor activity in order to maintain the most competitive rates, complying with all relevant laws and travel business legislation.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in serving customers in a polite and professional manner, consistently converting unhappy customers to very satisfied customers, and providing business solutions to clients.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Demonstrated leadership skills by helping colleagues achieve targets, coaching colleagues on the sales process, and developing staff in core competences to ensure success.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Consistently demonstrated a team player attitude by helping colleagues achieve targets, solving problems to meet daily KPIs, and working alongside airline duty officers to meet KPIs and airline standards.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Successfully dispatched flights on time, overseeing the boarding of the aircraft, and consistently achieved airline on-time performance standards.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Has experience in selling travel products to a wide range of clients, adopting business strategies to drive sales and meet targets, and up-selling relevant add-ons.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Demonstrated strong communication skills by responding to phone enquiries promptly, courteously, and in a friendly manner, and building strong relationships with clients.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Able to handle complex situations within the given industry safety measures, and demonstrated an in-depth knowledge of key health and safety standards used within the industry.

skills.name: Administrative Tasks
skills.explanation: Has experience in filing, photocopying, and general administrative duties, but the extent of these tasks is not as prominent as other skills.

skills.name: Travel Industry Knowledge
skills.explanation: Has extensive knowledge of the travel industry, including airline standards, health and safety standards, and travel business legislation.
